website_summaries.verdict: It folds up and stores far easier than a full-size high chair yet still works for everyday use.
pros: Features 6 height positions and 3 recline levels
Removable tray and dishwasher-safe insert make it easy to clean
If you've got limited space, this high chair can be stored out of the way but stays standing while folded for easier storage
cons: The seat is a lot smaller than non-foldable models, which can be uncomfortable for larger kids

customer_reviews.title: The good: - It really does fold well into small ...
customer_reviews.text: The good: - It really does fold well into small spaces. The bad: - However, it is very uncomfortable for the child: The space that you sit on is very small. A child, practically, ends up being squeezed in between the back piece and the between-the-legs-bar - Also, there is no where to put the feet, the little black foot peg is just too small to be practical - We actually ended up pulling up a very old one from the attic, and using that instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chimirev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this highchair. We have used it since he was 6 months old and are still using it now he is 2 years old. We are doing baby led weaning and this chair was easy to clean. Love the brown tray- it is really easy to clean and does not stain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good for Infants + older
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this high chair. It has extra cushioning for infants, and my little 5 month old is picky about comfort. The high chair comes out of the box already assembled, which is good because I am too tired to assemble anything. The design is very simple to fold out to use and fold back when done with feeding. The covers for the high chair I wash on regular cycle in cold and the fabric holds up. I read a lot of reviews before picking a high chair. This was the only high chair for which even the bad reviews were good, just people being extra picky about color or pattern of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Dreading Getting Out this High Chair for Kiddo #2
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing that wrong with this high chair, but I wouldn't buy it again. My second kiddo is 5 months old and I'm dreading bringing it out. I originally bought it because it folds up and out of the way. But I didn't think about the fact that I would be holding a baby while getting the chair out. You have to have two hands free. So, we very rarely folded it out of the way. There are many steps to take the chair cushion out to wash it. It's just not worth what I paid ($118).
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J.

customer_reviews.title: great chair for baby to toddler
customer_reviews.text: great chair for baby to toddler, only reason it did not get 5 stars is because the legs come out and we often trip on them. nearly fell with the baby a few times. and the cover is hard to remove for washing
customer_reviews.author: A.Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome high chair-I researched many chairs and landed on this one. I was debating between the Baby Bjorn, Fisher Price booster and Joovy Compact Chair. I have a small dining area and wanted something that wasn't clunky and took up a lot of room. This chair is wonderful! it's easy to open and fold away; my son loves sitting in it. I highly recommend this chair to anyone who wants a slim high chair, but still wants something of subtsance! This beats the popular booster chairs- it folds up very easily and is completely convenient forfolding away after each feeding and moving out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: George Vartanian

customer_reviews.title: Really love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Really love this chair. Folds down so slim and is perfect if you don’t want a high chair as a permanent furniture piece in your dining room. Folds up and down easily and quickly. Also I found it easy to take the cover off the chair to wash so I am not sure i agree with others reviews. I wouldn’t say it’s any more difficult than removing a car seat cover to wash.
customer_reviews.author: njames923

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandma's house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this highchair to keep at our house for when our grandson comes to visit -- it folds up very thin and can be stored in the corner out of the way. He likes to sit in it and watch us work in the kitchen and has fallen asleep a couple of times, so it must be comfortable. The pads come off and go in the washer which is super nice! Very pleased with the purchase -- some of the other ones that I looked at in this price range didn't seem sturdy, but this one is very sturdy. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Greta buy
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to us and we received it a little damaged, but the seller and I worked it out and we are happy. She really loves that she can sit at the big table with us all during meals and we can feed her. 6 months old seems a bit big for now but she will grow into it. Is adjustable too. Would recommend this to parents.
customer_reviews.author: R. SHIOTA

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Once you learn how, and where all the things are to maneuver its soooo easy! I love this highchair! It really does fold up out of the way nicely. It cleans easily and having three trays is a huge bonus. I have been through a few chairs and wish that I had started with this one! The only negative is they put a sewed in warning label showing on the front top of the chair :-/ I love the look and colors of this chair, the tag showing was unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Hines57

customer_reviews.title: Saves space and great for younger infants
customer_reviews.text: We live in a small LA apartment so the slim aspect fits our lifestyle so much better. It's easy to set up and fold up. The recline feature has been great! We've been able to put our daughter in it at a much younger age because of it. It's also wonderful for bottle feeding babies to lay back a little. My only two complaints is that it can easily be pushed and moved with my baby in it on hardwood which makes me nervous when our dogs are running around. Also I wish the tray was more adjustable. I feel like my baby is way too far away from it, even with the infant pad insert. I still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Msollenb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a childcare provider for the past 29 years. This high chair is by far, leaps and bounds ahead of any chair I’ve purchased in the past. I love it so much that I not only have one for my own grandchild, but I put another one in our mountain home. I also purchased one as a gift for my niece. It folds down super fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Z

customer_reviews.title: Graco Chair for Younguns.
customer_reviews.text: This chair makes feeding a young one easy and safe. I babysit a 19 month old and she just loves it when i pull her chair out and set it up. It's very simple to use and folds up nicely to take little storage space. I highly recommend this to anyone feeding young ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: I love this highchair
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair. I ordered this for my parents' house. I like it better than the one I have at my house. It can be easily folded and put away. The seat is easy to clean and very comfortable for my six month old. I like that front blockade kind of thing where he can be safe eve without the belt. Would def order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia H.

customer_reviews.title: This chair would be perfect expert for one major flaw-- the fabric on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair would be perfect expert for one major flaw-- the fabric on the chair! You have to remove it and put it in the washing machine to clean it. That's not a big deal, except that it's a pain in the butt to remove. If they would have used something wipeable for the fabric like most of the other highchairs it would be great. I'm trying to teach the baby to feed himself with a spoon but it gets everywhere and I don't have time to remove it and put it in the wash machine every single meal.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Cobbler

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Super high chair! We love how easy it is to pack up and set up. Great slip storage.Very study...our little one loves to move a lot in the chair and it stays put. We love the double trays. The adjustable back positions are very helpful. The infant insert helped him when we first started using the chair. The five point straps keep him secure. My only qualm is the ability to clean the straps and cover...not possible to remove the straps and throw in the washing machine so they are difficult to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: jhagen

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a year. While I was sold on how compact it is, I cannot understand why Graco would use a cover material that gets dirty fast. Sure its machine washable.. But if you have a sloppy kid like I do then you pretty much have to wash it after every meal. In the end, this high chair irritated me so much that I just threw it in the Trash bin (the space saving feature helped :) ). I did not want to burden someone else by donating/selling it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact, clean and sturdy high chair perfect four grandparents. We needed something for my daughter's infrequent visits with our granddaughter and this was a great Buy. We were able to store it in the basement and it was a whiz to set up. Our daughter felt it was very secure and stable for her 6 month old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Yarnfinder

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very happy with it so far. It really does what it claimes - fits into slim spaces. We live in an apartment and our kitchen is pretty small, so I take out this highchair only when Lo is with me in the kitchen ( we didn't start solids yet). It takes 30 seconds to put it up and down. The fabric is great - you can wipe it with wet cloth or take down the whole cover and wash it (instructions provided in the manual). It also folds flat(with tray!!) which is crucial if you are on the go. All and all another great Graco product!
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really like this, there are a lot of little snaps and hooks to keep the cover on, but it's fairly easy to wash, and does not shrink! Color stays true. My only complaint is I wish it were a tad taller, but it fits very nicely at a standard table. Also, small enough for the backseat of our compact car, big plus for travel to grandma's.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par
customer_reviews.text: This would be really great if it weren't ridiculously HEAVY. Also, you can remove the pad to wash, but good luck getting it back on- there's so many knobs to attach the material to and it's not intuitive. Mine looks like a mess because I just gave up trying to put the fabric back on correctly. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this high chair
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this high chair! We have 6 month old twins and have a small house. I did a lot of research to find high chairs that seemed durable, would last a good couple of years and that we could fold up and put away. These high chairs are perfect. They came assembled. We pulled them out of the boxes and they were ready to use. Folding them up is super easy and quick and they stores nicely in our pantry, only taking up about a foot of space side by side. Definitely one of our best purchases since our babies were born.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Balli

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why reveiws are so positive?
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave a negative comment, but I'll try to spare you the return shipping. The highchair just arrived and I am disappointed! Everything is great, but the depth of the seat is only 7.5" which is barely enough space for a toddler to sit. It also has a footrest that sets too far back. I am sending this back very dissapointed!! Great idea, poor execution!
customer_reviews.author: zoomer

customer_reviews.title: I just love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I just love this chair. My family and I rv so we needed something that folded up and also love the three settings so I can sit on the ground, chair or even stand if I want to feed the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan rauch

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. It folds together or opens with ease. You need to hands in order to do so though, so until the baby is old enough to hold itself up (not just head, but body), you will have to have help or put the child down. It is light enough as well that my 16 mon can pull it out of its storage space when she wants to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: We seriously love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: We seriously love this high chair. It stores so well in small spaces. I love that I can adjust the height easily depending on if I'm feeding her from the couch or at the table. The tray comes of easy, but not too easy and is a peach to clean up. It's washable and still looks brand new after tons of use.
customer_reviews.author: JJacobs

customer_reviews.title: Grammy approved!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair for my grandbaby- 5 months. Attractive, slim, and apparently comfortable for baby. A little tricky, but actually possible to unfold with one hand and foot in a pinch. Harness release button was a bit stiff at first, good now. Cover comes off to throw in the washer, but I ended up with extra snaps putting it back on. Guess I should have paid closer attention :) Good quality, wouldn't hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymom

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy clean up. Layer upon layer to get through. Though supportive during the first few months, once baby was sitting up, I ended up buying one of those wooden restaurant pyramid models and setting our little one at the table with us. Takes a beating and clean up is only a bottle of windex.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkTwiceWriteOnce

customer_reviews.title: This has been one of the best purchases for baby we have made
customer_reviews.text: 2016: I live in a very small house. This has been one of the best purchases for baby we have made! Update 1/28/18 It is very well made. We are now using it for our second child. I still love it. Update 1/31/2020 Its been used for three kids and still going strong! Solidly built and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: klucey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material - hidden cardboard as the back piece.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to clean. It does not just wipe and go as far as fabric is concerned. We took it apart to give it a good cleaning and discovered that the back of the chair was CARDBOARD! From now on, I am only buying high chairs that I've examined in person and can verify are completely made of plastic and can be wiped down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Welsh

customer_reviews.title: ... needed something for the grandkids and this chair is perfect. Love that it has several positions for the ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed something for the grandkids and this chair is perfect. Love that it has several positions for the babies back and the chair actually adjust almost to the floor so the toddler can climb on in without being lifted. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hide away!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this high chair. I love that it folds down for easy storage. We have a small kitchen and a very small eating area, so having a high chair with a large permanent footprint wasn't really an option. When unfolded it is still a pretty big high chair and takes up a pretty good part of our dining area. Overall I am really happy with this high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Krell

customer_reviews.title: It's very slim which is perfect for our family
customer_reviews.text: It's very slim which is perfect for our family. I can't stand clutter and put the chair away when not in use.. It folds up nicely and can be slid away in the closet or just aside by the table .. It works perfectly and it's also great because the top white part of the detachable piece comes off as well for easy cleaning ..
customer_reviews.author: SKM724

customer_reviews.title: This is the best high chair if you live in an apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is the best high chair if you live in an apartment. Easy to take apart and clean. Folds up teeny. I wish I would have known about it when my baby was smaller so I wouldn't have bothered with the high chair that attached to the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: but I'll be glad to have that feature if we need to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well with our baby. We haven't had occasion to fold it up yet, but I'll be glad to have that feature if we need to store it away. It's fabric is detachable and washable and the tray liner comes off for cleaning. The tray is fairly easy to adjust back and forth. We haven't had any issues and have enjoyed using this highchair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with everything besides the foot rest. It needs to be adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: but didn't like the idea of feeding him from the side
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a portable high chair that screws on to the edge of a table (or counter), but didn't like the idea of feeding him from the side. This is a great alternative, because it can fold up really small, but is still sturdy enough and portable enough for our tastes. Fabric is easy to wipe clean, and is easy to operate with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep looking clean.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair! But the material graco used does not wipe clean without leaving food streaks. I have to pull this apart several times a week to wash. Functionality and design is nice but keeping it clean is a nightmare. It would be nice if it could food could wipe off easier.
customer_reviews.author: sheila long

customer_reviews.title: Best highchair we've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: We love this highchair!! It is awesome for our small house but perfect for baby. Pro's: Easy storage Five Point Harness Great Cushioning Vibrant Colors Easy to clean tray Angle of seat adjusts NO CONS TO LIST. I love this highchair!
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical_Bri

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has the middle plastic divider for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair after returning the high chair I originally registered for. Love that it has the middle plastic divider for the babies legs (original one I bought only had a harness). Only thing I dislike is the clasps are a little odd to buckle... Other than that 5 stars. Folds up really well, no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda complicated for my mother in law and I could barely use it for my 18 month old as I was pregnant because I had to lift her up to place her in plus the leg room was too small for her. I wish the tray/table part was removable which would have made it a whole lot easier for us and though it folds, I still takes up a lot of space, it could be slimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Damilola

customer_reviews.title: ... comparing chair and unfortunately I thought this was a good option. The main issue that I have with ...
customer_reviews.text: I spend many days reading reviews and comparing chair and unfortunately I thought this was a good option. The main issue that I have with this chair it's that the fabric is not easy to clean as the image shows. The fabric cannot be easily clean with a wipe. You need to put it in the washer and it takes time to airdry. Also, after the first 3 washes, the fabric started to break. I would have to say that it's a very comfortable chair but the cleaning issue is a NIGHTMARE. I thought about returning it but it's too late.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair, my daughter is 4 months old and sits well in the 2nd reclining position. I did not have any trouble setting the chair up and have found it to be very accommodating size wise. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: pollinators

customer_reviews.title: made sooo well priced great would highly recommend this chair
customer_reviews.text: This is truly slim! made sooo well priced great would highly recommend this chair............ Really would!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Needs
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size for us as Grandparents when the grandchildren come to visit. It is easily pulled out of closet for use and easily put away when they leave. Does not take up alot of space. (Wish I could say the same thing for a Graco car seat we recently purchased. It is Huge!)
customer_reviews.author: mar16

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable height feature!
customer_reviews.text: Great features also include three nesting trays. The bottom one is permanently fixed to the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lower

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how wide the bottom of the legs open
customer_reviews.text: only one thing I can say about this. It is compact for sure. I don't like how wide the bottom of the legs open. You can easily trip on it. Too wide Otherwise it is compact and a space saver
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: We have two of these and they are wonderful! The fold up nice and slim and the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and they are wonderful! The fold up nice and slim and the seat reclines for babies who aren't quite ready to sit of completely straight. The only comaknt I have is that it takes two hands to open it, but other than that it is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for our grandson and this high chair is so easy to fold and put aside until the next time ...
customer_reviews.text: We babysit twice a week for our grandson and this high chair is so easy to fold and put aside until the next time we babysit. Perfect to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: We love the highchair but it would be great if the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the highchair but it would be great if the wheels locked in place. Fortunately, we use it mainly on a carpeted area. Patents who will primary use the highchair on hardwood/tile will want to look for one with no wheels or one with wheels that lock.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes cheaper doesn't mean better..
customer_reviews.text: Definitely don't recommend this high chair. Very poorly built. Ours was wobbly and uneven the minute we took it out of the box. There are no locks on the wheels so it can freely move. Which in my opinion is unsafe. When you take off the tray there is still a smaller permanently attached tray on the high chair. Which some may like, but we did not. Also just not very comfy feeling for our little guy. Definitely will be returning this high chair. Yes, it was a very good price. But I guess we've learned from this that you need to spend more money on products to ensure they won't be total crap.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Vieth

customer_reviews.title: Easy / Light / excelletn
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand son - We love it. Light, easy to move around, several positions allowing easy adjusting to multiple settings [in the kitchen, in the dining table, near the couch in the family room, etc.]
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stash away
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use and clean, and most importantly easy to fold up and slide in a space by the refrigerator out of the way. One of the first things like this that came fully assembled ready to go out of the box- and easy to get it back to that size if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roald

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if.....
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair, but really hate that the fabric is not water resistant and easier to clean. As it stands I plan to wash it and make a plastic covering to put over it so that it stays clean and makes my life easier and my son's chair clean and free of messy spills.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: This high chair is good, however
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is good, however, from the name slim spaces I thought it would be more compact. The base/legs are still wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jct

customer_reviews.title: Great for what is needed and storage
customer_reviews.text: Great simple chair. The only slimness is when it folds though.... overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aztec

customer_reviews.title: my kiddo wont fit in it when he's 3 like they advertise
customer_reviews.text: small high chair, compact i guess is the word, my kiddo wont fit in it when he's 3 like they advertise, its pretty well fitted now and he's only 1
customer_reviews.author: Leeora Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Love this Versatile Highchair
customer_reviews.text: Love this space-saver highchair. It fits in the car trunk, folds to fit in corner, and is easy to wipe clean the tray by hand or wash in dishwasher. And it has easy-to-wipe fabric , or it can be washed in washing machine. I love that the chair slides down close to the floor (adjusts). It's easy getting iit nto trunk or storing in a corner. You can use it in the low position also. (Great for picnics etc.) Love that it stands alone when folded. No more scraping the wall. Very versatile. Great product for a growing child.
customer_reviews.author: T~

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grandmas house
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and I love that you can adjust the chair back
customer_reviews.author: Goose55

customer_reviews.title: This highchair folds easily and collapses too
customer_reviews.text: This highchair folds easily and collapses too. The tray can stay on when collapsed. It's easy to store in a small footprint. The fabric on the seat is not the easiest to wipe down however it does come off to wash. I like the double tray for easy clean up and the center post that keeps the baby from slipping out if not strapped in.
customer_reviews.author: N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting it is extrememly easy. It should work for her for several years
customer_reviews.text: We purcashed this for our granddaughter for our home. A chair simple to store behind a door, etc. Adjusting it is extrememly easy. It should work for her for several years. The chair is sturdy and safe. We really liked the fact that we were able to watch a video prior to purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Highchair!!
customer_reviews.text: wonderful!! So easy to fold and unfold. My grandson is five months and he loves being in it. My daughter loves it because it is safe and easy to manage. It folds completly for storage, doesn't take up any room at all!!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best high chair for the price, super easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: oalech

customer_reviews.title: This highchair is super easy to set up (and comes already assembled) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! This highchair is super easy to set up (and comes already assembled) and take down. When up it works just like a regular highchair, and when down it stores in tight spaces (being less that 9 inches). It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: adm1220

customer_reviews.title: Soiled Easily
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm missing something...How on earth do you clean this thing?! It catches all kinds of stains. Very dirty and nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent chair for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent chair for my Grandson , it works great! Folds up and out of the way super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, Horrible fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair is many ways, except the fabric... Oh my! I wish I had known this was the fabric! So, unless your baby can eat with great manners, you are going to have to wash this chair a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to put away! So easy to use! I did need to have the instruction Manual out for a few days as I would forget how to close collapse it and pull it out again! Seriously so easy though
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kinghorn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not too big and bulky. Light on wheels. Easy to clean. Convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stores great, no real space saving when in use.
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair, works as intended but beware! The footprint is really quite large when it's open and in use...
customer_reviews.author: B. Hulett

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair,very easy to use after 1-2 times practice and it's foldable,my 8 months old baby enjoy sitting in to have her baby food,I only paid less 90 dollars on this one,very good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Clair

customer_reviews.title: We have a small house and I love that it folds nearly flat when not in use
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorites with this last baby. We have a small house and I love that it folds nearly flat when not in use, but is still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair with great support for younger babies
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: A grandma's review!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it for one year because it snug right up to her, so she was secure and food wasn't falling in her lap. I struggled a bit to set it up, but once I figured it out, I'm thinking it will we easier from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: barb falconer

customer_reviews.title: Small space? This is your chair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair! Super portable, folds away easily and seems to be comfortable for my 8 month old with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with these highchairs
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these highchairs! I purchased 2 of them. From the washable seat, safety belt, the tray fits close to the children and it folds up easy. The children fit comfortably without sliding down. Plus they came ready to use out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, stores away. Grandkids are getting a lot of use out of this. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Seager

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my grandchildren when they visit. Sturdy, functional, and easy to put away after their visit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Grandma's house, folds down easily, great for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super slim! Easy to take apart to clean. Rolls great. No problems!!
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL G MIRAMONTES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great folds up very nice to put away when grandkids are not here
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: ... fabric on this high chair does not clean up easily. It ends up looking dirty all the time
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on this high chair does not clean up easily. It ends up looking dirty all the time. It is a huge effort to clean it and even after scubbing it for several minutes it will still look dirty after it dries. The tray is great and cleans up easily, but it isn't worth it since the rest of the chair does not clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!! You take it out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect!! You take it out of the box and it's ready to go!! And it folds down into a small box!!
customer_reviews.author: K T Ops

customer_reviews.title: hard to wipe out and easy to get dirt
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, hard to wipe out and easy to get dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this highchair. It's a great highchair, and it really would be great even if it didn't fold into such a small size for storage. Great for people like us in a condo or small house.
customer_reviews.author: DaMu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair worked well in small spaces and love how easy it was to assemble and use
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: MY GREAT GRAND SON LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: MY GREAT GRAND SON LOVED IT. he ate all his baby food and fell asleep in the chair. it is his first high chair.
customer_reviews.author: frances badman

customer_reviews.title: Best Highchair out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair! It is very adjustable in every way you can imagine, and is super slim for storage. My baby loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Aleyna

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair. Fits tucked away in our small kitchen. We are able to pull it up to our table with no issues when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This high chair has all the functionality one would expect. The reclining seat is perfect to adjust to your child's stages :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair but difficult to wash the parts, and impossible to remove the straps to wash.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Copied my daughter in law's choice and ordered for Grandpa and Mimi's house.... Easy to use, stores beautifully AND totally washable.. Love, Love, Love !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair! Takes up hardly any room when folded ...
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair! Takes up hardly any room when folded and the tray is easy to remove one handed. The fabric is easily spot cleaned so I haven't had to run it through the wash yet, so I can't speak to that. I do wish it could be folded/unfolded one handed but nothing's perfect, right? Great highchair for those with limited space.
customer_reviews.author: IrishCurl

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy fold.
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this high chair can get. Folds easily and I fold it every day, Simply to sweep underneath it easier.
customer_reviews.author: MeredithVH

customer_reviews.title: I love this highchair
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair, we had to return the first as the folding latch was stuck.....easy and quick exchange. Folds great and is a slim fit.
customer_reviews.author: kttn

customer_reviews.title: The material is VERY hard to clean. Takes a ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is VERY hard to clean. Takes a lot of room. Very bulky. Once you take the cover out and wash it, it will not be the same. It is also difficult to put the cover back on.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works out perfectly at this grandparent's home. Storage is a breeze after our grandchild's visit.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect high-chair if you are going to be traveling
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect high-chair if you are going to be traveling. It is also a good size and the tray holds a few toys.
customer_reviews.author: luke Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs and stays out of the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs and stays out of the way more in the kitchen. This is one of those things you don't want to have to take in and out of a closet everyday. It collapses so slim and is really easy to fold down and push out of the way. We are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's easy to move, easy to clean and comfortable to sit in (I guess:)
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

product_meta.title: Graco Slim Spaces High Chair, Manor
product_meta.description: The Graco Slim Spaces Space Saver High Chair is a compact high chair that folds to just 8.5 inches, making it a breeze to store anywhere. This space-saving high chair comes pre-assembled in the box. The stain-resistant seat pad and dishwasher-safe tray makes cleanup a breeze. The six-position height adjustment, three-position recline and removable plush infant support make keeping baby comfortable easy. Keep your baby in style with the precious Manor fashion. Boys and girls will love the subtle grey diamond pattern, accented with mint green, soft cream and cozy gray.
feature_bullets: This Graco high chair features the most compact fold to fit in slim spaces
Space saver high chair comes pre-assembled and ready to use right out of the box
Stain resistant and machine washable seatpad makes clean-up easy on this folding high chair
6 height positions and 3 recline levels make this portable high chair ideal for easy feedings.Extra-plush infant body support positions baby comfortably for early feedings
Dimension:32"L x 23"W x 43"H.. For child up to three years, not to exceed 40 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars272 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
